CustomField.formula: "Valt onder "&TEXT(Type__c)&" "& IF( Primary_Relation__r.IsPersonAccount, Primary_Relation__r.FirstName&" "& IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Primary_Relation__r.MiddleName)), Primary_Relation__r.MiddleName&" "&Primary_Relation__r.LastName, Primary_Relation__r.LastName ), Primary_Relation__r.Name )
CustomField.label: Subsidiary Relation Name
